question: I have been juicing for about a year. Every time I have a large glass of beet and lemon juice I have frequent urination for about half a day. I have been checked for Diabetes and had blood work, all is normal.I had juice last night and had to get up 6 times during the night and now several times this morning. It is finally slowing down. Could I be having an allergic reaction to the juice?
title: Jucing and frequent urination
